title: Body Fat Calculator
metaDescription: Free body fat calculator - Estimate your body fat percentage using the U.S. Navy Method or BMI-based method.

form.title: Enter Your Information
form.neckHelp: Measure below the larynx, sloping downward
form.waistHelpFemale: Measure at the narrowest part of the torso
form.hipHelp: Measure at the widest part of the hips

method.navyDesc: Requires neck, waist, and hip (women) measurements
method.bmiDesc: Estimation based on age, weight, and height

info.title: About the Body Fat Calculator
info.description: This calculator estimates your body fat percentage using the U.S. Navy Method or BMI-based method. The Navy method uses body circumference measurements, while the BMI method is based on your age, weight, and height.
info.categoriesTitle: Body Fat Categories (American Council on Exercise)
info.limitations: These results are only an estimate. For more accurate body fat measurement, consider using instruments like bioelectric impedance analysis or consult with a healthcare professional.
